meanings: (목숨이 끊어지다) die (of/from), (완곡한 표현) pass away[on], (타인에 의해) be killed, (literary) expire, (literary) perish, (lite...
die and be reduced to ashes

vlive.korean: 그럼요 잠죽자! 잠은 죽어서 자야지! Of course! Let's sleep when we die! Let's sleep when we die! 듣기 View video VICTON : 찬이의 조금 늦은 생일🎉🎉
vlive.english: Of course! Let's sleep when we die! Let's sleep when we die!

vlive.korean: [바쁘니깐 빨리 나가요] 두 분 빨리 죽어서 나가면 안 돼요? [Please get out] Will you please die and let us go? 듣기 View video 핵인싸 동맹 (HACKINSSA CREW) : [핵인싸 동맹] EP.35 감스트 랜선 친구 만들려다 경상도 싸나이와 현피각?! HACKINSSA CREW
vlive.english: [Please get out] Will you please die and let us go?

vlive.korean: 진짜 다 죽어서 이제 잘 못하네. It's really all gone, so I'm bad at it now. 듣기 View video 뷰티로그(beautylog) : [뷰티로그 4회]몸매 종결자! 장재인의 필라테스!
vlive.english: It's really all gone, so I'm bad at it now.

vlive.korean: 나 죽어서 남의 플레이어 보이는 거야? I'm dead and now watching others playing? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 신비한 오락사전 스페셜
vlive.english: I'm dead and now watching others playing?

vlive.korean: 자꾸 죽어서 여기 사람 없는 곳으로 일단 가겠습니다. Because I keep dying, I'll go to a place where there's no one for now. 듣기 View video CHOON (춘) entertainment : [#용국]용또죽의 배그방송
vlive.english: Because I keep dying, I'll go to a place where there's no one for now.

examples.korean: I feel like I’ve died and gone to heaven. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 죽어서 하늘나라에 간 기분이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I feel like I’ve died and gone to heaven. Add to Wordbook

examples.english: A father lives after death in his son. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Man toes up and turns to clay. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사람은 죽어서 흙으로 돌아간다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Upon dying, Bill Gates went to purgatory. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 빌 게이츠가 죽어서 연옥에 갔다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She was disconsolate over the death of her dog. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 개가 죽어서 그녀는 절망에 잠겨 있다. Neungyule
